name: graylog
tagline: A self-hosted platform for collecting, searching, and analyzing logs
description: Graylog is a self-hosted log management and SIEM platform for collecting, indexing, and analyzing log data. It includes dashboards, alerts, log search, and integrates with Elasticsearch and MongoDB for monitoring large systems.

features.title: Log Management
features.description: Collect, index, and analyze log data from servers, applications, and network devices

features.title: Siem Capabilities
features.description: Security information and event management with threat detection and correlation

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Leverage Elasticsearch for powerful full-text search and log indexing

features.title: Real-Time
features.description: Search and analyze logs in real-time with sub-second query response

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Build custom dashboards with widgets for visualizing log data and metrics

features.title: Alert Configuration
features.description: Set up alerts based on log patterns, thresholds, and anomaly detection

features.title: Stream Processing
features.description: Route and process logs with pipelines, extractors, and enrichment rules

features.title: Scalable Architecture
features.description: Horizontal scaling to handle millions of log messages per second
